spec_data.Name: sparkleshare
spec_data.Description:
Easy file sharing based on git repositories. A special folder is setup and
directories/files placed within are placed in a git-based version control
system and synchronized elsewhere.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 24 Feb 2017 11:02:08 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Easy file sharing based on git repositories
